tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE trading_decisions (
    decision_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    analysis_id INT,
    decision_date TIMESTAMP,
    trading_action VARCHAR(10),
    trading_price FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE news_articles (
    article_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    article_title VARCHAR(255),
    article_content TEXT,
    publish_date DATE,
    sentiment_score FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE analysis_results (
    analysis_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    article_id INT REFERENCES news_articles(article_id),
    source_id INT REFERENCES sources(source_id),
    analysis_date TIMESTAMP,
    sentiment_category VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE trade_decisions (
    decision_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    analysis_id INT REFERENCES analysis_results(analysis_id),
    decision_date DATE,
    trade_action VARCHAR(50),
    trade_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);
